text: Why not follow Lord Russell's lead today? Head for the parks to enjoy the sun. Not report, work on average between 55 and 60 hours a week. They also put in an extra two or three evenings. And they never go on strike.
handwritten_text: Why not follow Lord Russell's lead today? Head for the parks to enjoy the sun. Not report, work on average between 55 and 60 hours a week. They also put in an extra two or three evenings. And they never go on strike.
